pogSu0.name: Circling Pass
pogSu0.why: They put you back in Open Guard Passing
pogSu0.description: Upsidedown grip, circling, making your way to a overhook on the head.
pogSu0.b1: Nothing, you pass to side control
pogSu0.b2: They frame and square up, creating a Leg Drag fight

pogSu1.name: Far Side Leg Drag
pogSu1.why: They frame, turn, and square up with you
pogSu1.description: As they frame and start to square up, drive them over to the leg drag on the far side.
pogSu1.b2: They frame and square up, creating a Leg Drag fight

pogSu2.name: Duck Under
pogSu2.why: They bring there leg over the top and try to collect your knee
pogSu2.description: Keep pinning the bottom leg down, while you duck under the top leg and pass on the other side.
pogSu2.b2: They pass their leg over you head, putting you in Double Unders Pass

pogSu3.name: Crab Ride
pogSu3.why: They invert through to a Kiss of the Dragon back take
pogSu3.description: As they invert through for the KoD back take, you counter by diving through to a crab ride.
pogSu3.b2: They invert, putting you in a Crab Ride fight

pogSe0.name: Shoulder Push Foot Lift
pogSe0.why: They are playing defence in Seated Guard
pogSe0.description: Shoulder push, 2 on 1 grip on the foot, pulling and lifting.

pogSe1.name: Nearside Knee Cut
pogSe1.why: They over-extend their leg, reaching in HG
pogSe1.description: As they over-extend their leg reaching for a connection, knee cut through.
pogSe1.b2: They frame and square up, creating a Leg Drag fight

pogSe2.name: Kimura
pogSe2.why: They over-extend their arm, reaching in HG
pogSe2.description: As they over-extend their arm reaching for your knee, reach over and jump the kimura.
pogSe2.b2: They pass their leg over you head, putting you in Double Unders Pass

pogSe3.name: Winshield Wiper
pogSe3.why: They repummel the foot to Shin to Shin
pogSe3.description: As they repummel the foot to Shin to Shin, windshield wiper your foot inside.
pogSe3.b2: They invert, putting you in a Crab Ride fight

phgs0.name: Knee Cut (near side)
phgs0.why: They put you back in Half Guard
phgs0.description: Crushing the knee down, connecting your hands underneath, and smash passing through.
phgs0.b1: Nothing, you pass to side control
phgs0.b2: You get put back in standard half-guard
